meanings.definition: Capable of being sent via email.
meanings.sent1: The document is emailable, so you can easily share it with your colleagues.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure the file is emailable before attaching it to the email.
meanings.sent3: I never thought a piece of paper could be emailable, but technology surprises me!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were so emailable that they spread like wildfire through the company.
meanings.sent5: The emailable photo captured the essence of the moment perfectly.

meanings.definition: Suitable for sending through electronic mail.
meanings.sent1: Is this document emailable, or do I need to print it out?
meanings.sent2: The report is emailable, so you can forward it to the team easily.
meanings.sent3: I find it amusing how even the most mundane things can be emailable nowadays.
meanings.sent4: His words were emailable, resonating with everyone who read them.
meanings.sent5: The emailable attachment contained all the necessary information for the meeting.
